en.CHANGE_LANGUAGE_DESCRIPTION: Please select a language of your choice
en.AUTHOR_DESCRIPTION: Hi, my name is Sudershan Singh and I'am the creator of this app. I love developing such projects as part of my hobby and I hope you enjoy using it.If you'd like to connect you can always reach out to me on LinkedIn, Whatsapp or Instagram.
en.ABOUT_DESCRIPTION: This project is purely for educational purpose and is open source so anyone can contribute for it's refinement.The front end of this project uses React and the backend runs on firebase.
en.DESCRIPTION: Welcome to crowdly, a social media app built on top of ReactJS and Firebase. Crowdly helps you connect with others in the community, so you can share anything that's on your mind.
en.ABOUT_PAGE_DESCRIPTION: It is an open source project developed for educational purpose and fun. It's front end is built on top of React Js and the backend runs on firebase, with a nodeJS server acting as a middleware.
en.AUTHOR_PAGE_NOTE: Hi, my name is Sudershan Singh, and I'm the author of this application. I enjoy developing such projects as part of my hobby, there are more project like this listed on my
en.AUTHOR_PAGE_NOTE_2: profile. If you'd like to connect please feel free to reach out on my
en.CONTRIBUTION_2: Since this is an open-source project you as a developer can contribute as well. If you'd like to do so please feel free to clone the project from the
en.CONTRIBUTION_3: , and raise PRs to the develop branch.
en.FEEDBACK_2: Your suggestion/feedback is valuable. Please use the form below and let me know how you feel about crowdly.

hi.DESCRIPTION: рдХреНрд░рд╛рдЙрдбрд▓реА рдореЗрдВ рдЖрдкрдХрд╛ рд╕реНрд╡рд╛рдЧрдд рд╣реИ, рдпрд╣ рдПрдХ рд╕реЛрд╢рд▓ рдиреЗрдЯрд╡рд░реНрдХ рд╣реИ рдЬреЛ React JS рдФрд░ Firebase рдкрд░ рдмрдирд╛ рд╣реИред рдХреНрд░рд╛рдЙрдбрд▓реА рдЖрдкрдХреЛ рд╕рдореБрджрд╛рдп рдХреЗ рдЕрдиреНрдп рд▓реЛрдЧреЛрдВ рд╕реЗ рдЬреБрдбрд╝рдиреЗ рдореЗрдВ рдорджрдж рдХрд░рддрд╛ рд╣реИ, рддрд╛рдХрд┐ рдЖрдк рдЕрдкрдиреЗ рдорди рдХреА рдХреЛрдИ рднреА рдмрд╛рдд рдЙрдирд╕реЗ рд╕рд╛рдЭрд╛ рдХрд░ рд╕рдХреЗрдВред
